thread.title: Global Markets: Japanese Stocks Fall; Rest of Asia Is More Upbeat

author: Kenan Machado
title: Global Markets: Japanese Stocks Fall; Rest of Asia Is More Upbeat
text:
Shares of technology firms tumbled Monday, as a shakeout in the marketâ€™s best-performing sector caused the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite to endure their worst day since the February correction.
Tech stocks, a major contributor to the nine-year bull-market rally, suffered one of their most crushing sessions of the year, forcing investors to question the resiliency of a sector that appears to be priced for perfection.
